A high volume of failed login attempts t.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4625 and Zeek logs for authentication failures. Group events by target username and source IP address. Identify accounts with a high number of failed login attempts within a short time frame. Use time series analysis or statistical thresholds (e.g., z-score) on failed login counts per account/source IP pair.

Multiple failed login attempts distribut.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4625 and Zeek logs for authentication failures. Group events by source IP address. Identify source IPs that have a high number of failed login attempts distributed across a wide range of distinct target user accounts. Calculate entropy on the distribution of target usernames per source IP; high entropy with many failures indicates spraying.
